legend.title: Legend
legend.description: Question or instruction to user - appears above the component. If component is repeatable, the legend appears next to the input, with the number added automatically (for example, child 1)

hint.title: Hint text
hint.description: Text to help users answer a question - appears in grey under the legend (like this text)

legendSummary.title: Legend (Summary version)
legendSummary.description: The text used on the 'check your answers' page. Ideally a shorter version of the legend text
